text: "Way with Words" is a song by Canadian musician Bahamas. The song is featured as the second single from his 2018 album Earthtones, and was released on December 1, 2017. == Release == The song was released on December 1, 2017. == Music video == A music video for the song was released on Bahamas's YouTube on December 1, 2017. == Charts == {| class="wikitable" |+ !Chart (2018) !Peak position |- | |} == References == Category:2018 songs Category:Canadian folk songs
title: Way with Words (Bahamas song)
